name: The Hatfield Chest
description: Invite a dash of elegance into your bedroom with the Hatfield, a stylish chest, with three drawers offering ample storage. It offers a timeless appeal, thanks to its classic silhouette and low-profile. The recessed plinth base, a small detail that nevertheless speaks volumes, attests to our artisans' superb skills in creating pieces of luxury furniture that represent the very best of British design. Ample storage is provided in the three drawers, each of which is positioned on soft-close runners for ultimate smoothness and ease of use. Organise your items between the three drawers which open with your choice of circular or rectangular drop handles which offer a modern accent, providing the perfect finishing touch.
